attributes.action: Destroy all DNA database records held, whether the subjects have a convictions or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All DNA samples are theft and as such, the forced collection of samples is a fundamental violation of human rights. DNA is the blueprint for a human being and extremely personal. No one knows what is being done with it now or what might be done with it long after we are all gone.
